room_title: Escape room "Mission: Z" by 8D Room Escape & Board Games in Boston
review: The six of us did the Mission Z. The scenario, gadgets, and props were very creative; better than what I've seen elsewhere. One or two of the puzzles were kind of impossible to solve without using a hint, but overall they were satisfying to work through.

room_title: Escape room "Mission: Z" by 8D Room Escape & Board Games in Boston
review: Tried the Mission Z room and were bummed out that we didn't escape. But all of us did have a great time and that's what really matters! I've been to about 6 or 7 different rooms and this definitely had the most puzzles. I recommend at least 4 people to do this room as three didn't really have enough brain power to make it through the long list of challenges.Some of the clues and mini puzzles were quite obtuse and I wonder if anyone's made it out without ANY hints. Regardless, it shows that they put a lot of time into designing a room that kept you busy.

room_title: Escape room "Mission: Z" by 8D Room Escape & Board Games in Boston
review: Had a great experience in the new Mission Z room, extremely well done, friendly, just a great experience. Thanks so much! Will be back to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Mission: Z" by 8D Room Escape & Board Games in Boston
review: Loved the Mission Z and Half Treasure Map rooms. Iâ€™ve done 5 rooms in 4 states so far and Mission Z tops them all! Wonderful experience. Highly recommend going here.
